text: Which institution is most responsible for the global spread of #Coronavirus? Incredibly, it’s the @WHO. They knew about the danger but, for reasons of political correctness and to cover up for China, refused to call for border closures and travel restrictions #BloodOnTheirHands

domain.name: Person
